Text:
Thank you bySenzati and seeders.

Works great on Windows 8 64-bit.

There are several keys in the ReadMe! text file.

Once installed go to: > File > Settings > General > and set Check for updates to Never.
dosent work it stops responding before you can enter the key :( i have win 8 pro 64bit
Block the app in your firewall and then launch the program and enter the key. I just did this and it works fine.
